name: Words Quiz - Guess The Animal
description:
Words Quiz - Guess The Animal is Easy to play but Hard to master, Lots of fun, and family friendly!

Can You Guess The Animal From The Letters?

Are you ready to play the hottest guessing game on the market? Test your logic and reasoning skills with Guess The Animal From The Letters! Are you up for the challenge?

★ ENDLESS FUN WITH NEW PUZZLES! ★

Can you guess the Animal and unlock the levels? Countless puzzles from easy to tricky are waiting for you! New puzzles are added continuously for endless word fun!

★ PURE, INSTANT FUN ★

No registration, no complicated rules. Just start playing and have fun!

★ SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY ★

Features:

★ Easy to play, hard to master
★ More Levels for you to solve
★ Guess The Animal From The Letters!
★ Ask your friends for help when stuck!
★ High quality graphics.

Hints:

Stuck on a puzzle? Don't worry, our game provides several different hints to help you out.

★ Expose a Letter - Using this will reveal one random letter in the puzzle.

★ Remove Letters - This hint removes most of the letters from the board which are not used in the puzzle.

★ Quick Solve - This hint will completely solve the word question for you.

So what are you waiting for? Download Words Quiz - Guess The Animal! Now.

Free Game by Deyaa Software.
